title: [Connections][Filter]: switch between filter results by Up/Down arrow keys
author: PetbkA
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
When using filter in _Connections_ tree (_Options → Connections → Filter search matches in connection tree_), choosing the connection from the result via _Up/Down_ arrow keys is possible only after switching the focus to _Connections_ tree by clicking it or pressing _Tab_.

Meanwhile Up/Down arrow keys work OK if filter is disabled.
